title: Lost pouch :(
content:
Guys Iâ€™ve lost my white mesh pouch with a blue handle, here are itâ€™s characteristics:

-Deadpool Keychain
-Black and White Calculator

Sorry for the spam type post but I really need it ;-;
Please DM if you have it
Or actually even lmk where all the lost and founds are cuz security guards keep telling me to fuck off

comments.body: you can ask the reception in any floor (if you've lost it in BE block) where the lost and found is and they'll tell you to ask one of the cleaner aunties in that floor. they're very helpful and you will usually get your stuff back.

The aunties were very nice about it in fact she asks me everyday now if I found it, OAT was the last I saw the pouch tho
Thanks for the help tho :)

I stole your pouch cry about it lil bitch
Send 2k to my number Iâ€™ll bring it tomorrow
